org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.mail

类 MailSenderValidatorAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.mail.MailSenderValidatorAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @AutoConfigureAfter(value=MailSenderAutoConfiguration.class)
 @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="spring.mail",
                       value="test-connection")
 @ConditionalOnSingleCandidate(value=org.springframework.mail.javamail.JavaMailSenderImpl.class)
public class MailSenderValidatorAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Auto configuration for testing mail service connectivity on startup.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.3.0
